attributes.action: Scrap covid passports for clubbing/entertainment industries
attributes.additional_details: Because we have have rights . We are in control of our own bodies and what we want pumped into us . You the government are trying to control the public and take back the population by injecting us with a knocked up vaccine made in a matter of months that will eventually kill us all off one by one stop us reproducing and keeping the government costs down . We don’t want your new world order !
attributes.background: It is against human rights to be forced into having a jab or any vaccine you don’t wish to have . By making it compulsory for people to have covid passports is absolutely disgusting and controlling. We should have the right to decide.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
